channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: iOS 18.4 iPhone Warning: Update Fixes Bugs But Adds 1 Problem, Report Says
item.description: The new iPhone update has a lot going for it, but it also seems to create a problem for some users.

item.title: Nintendo Delaying Switch 2 US Pre-Orders Due To Tariffs, Market Drop

item.title: Why Construction 3D Printing Is Gaining Ground In Post-Wildfire LA
item.description: In a time when wildfires are growing in frequency and intensity—driven by climate change and extreme heat—Zareiyan sees AC as a timely solution.
